translation.en: [TV host] She's stacking three layers of chocolate sponge
translation.fr: Elle empile ses couches de génoise au chocolat

translation.en: on top of three layers of lemon, sandwiched with fresh raspberries…
[Rahul] I'm making buttercream roses.
translation.fr: Mes roses à la crème au beurre.

translation.en: [Jon] My artistic skills coming out now.
I'd love to get the presentation right. Probably the opposite of Kim-Joy.
translation.fr: J'aimerais une présentation parfaite. Je suis probablement l'opposé de Kim-Joy.

translation.en: [Kim-Joy] Yeah, I think I like the decorating. It's probably my favorite part…
translation.fr: Oui, j'aime la décoration. C'est sûrement ma partie préférée.

translation.en: -[Noel] Come on, kids. -[Sandi] You can do this, Rahul.
[Ruby] I don't think that's gonna stay. It's literally caved in at the back.
translation.fr: Il ne tiendra pas. Il s'affaisse à l'arrière.

translation.en: [Noel] Bakers, you--
[Ruby] …stay. It's literally caved in at the back.
[Noel Fielding] Bakers, you only have one minute left.
-[Manon] Okay, do you need help? -[man screaming] [Briony] It's okay. You've got this.
[Jon] I think I've done Del Boy proud. He'd try and sell it for a couple quid.
translation.fr: Del Boy est fier de moi. Il pourrait vendre mon gâteau.

translation.en: [Ruby] Look at the state of it. What an absolute state.
translation.fr: Regarde dans quel état il est. Un désastre.

translation.en: [Rahul] It looks terrible. Melting and breaking from everywhere.
translation.fr: Il est horrible. Il fond et s'effrite de partout.

translation.en: [Jon] There it is. It's done.
[Ruby] That's it, guys. I'm so wounded.
translation.fr: Ça y est. Je suis contrariée.

translation.en: [Sandi] I'm sorry, bakers, but your time is up.
translation.fr: Navrée, chers pâtissiers, mais votre temps est écoulé.

translation.en: That is the end of all of your vegan challenges. Well done.
translation.fr: C'est la fin de vos défis végans. Beau travail.

translation.en: -Oh God. No. -I think your cake's just fallen.
translation.fr: Mon Dieu. Non ! Ton gâteau s'est effondré.

translation.en: [in Mandarin] No, no, no, no!
[in Mandarin] When was the last time you killed someone?
translation.fr: À quand remonte ton dernier meurtre ?

translation.en: Couple weeks ago.
[man] Are you serious? Who did you kill?
Some guy who was causing trouble at the docks.
translation.fr: Un type qui causait des problèmes sur les quais.

translation.en: I usually don't take the time to ask their names. Why?
translation.fr: Je ne leur demande pas leurs noms. Pourquoi ?

translation.en: I've been in this game almost 30 years. Fuck.
translation.fr: Je fais ça depuis presque 30 ans. Mince.

translation.en: I used to be the guy they called when things got real.
translation.fr: On m'appelait en temps de crise.

translation.en: Now I'm only brought in to clean up someone else's mess. [scoffs]
We do what we're told.
Maybe they're trying to keep you out of trouble.
translation.fr: Ils essaient peut-être de t'éviter des ennuis.

translation.en: Like a sign of respect.
My nickname is Blood Boots.
Shouldn't I get them bloody every once in a while?
Hey, bro, this is what happens when you give yourself a nickname.
translation.fr: Voilà ce qui arrive quand on se donne un surnom.

translation.en: It creates too many expectations.
There's blood on your boots now.
translation.fr: Tu as du sang sur tes bottes.

translation.en: [man, in English] Shut up.
[in Mandarin] Hurry up. Less talking, more disposing of bodies.
translation.fr: Dépêchez-vous. Moins de bavardage. Débarrassez-vous des corps. J'ai des voisins.

translation.en: I have neighbors.
translation.fr: Débarrassez-vous des corps. J'ai des voisins.

translation.en: Damn, did you burn something?
Dad.
Isn't he supposed to be in hiding?
translation.fr: Il n'est pas censé se cacher ?

translation.en: He was worried about you.
Did you burn something?
Why only three?
They know you,
know what you can do.
translation.fr: ils savent ce que tu peux faire.

translation.en: Why only send three?
And why here?
Better to attack when you get out of your car,
translation.fr: Mieux vaut attaquer en sortant de la voiture

translation.en: where there's room for them to escape if it goes wrong.
translation.fr: où ils peuvent s'échapper en cas de problème.

translation.en: Or…
when you get out of the elevator.
Tight quarters in the hallway removes your advantage.
translation.fr: Si tu es dans le couloir, tu perds l'avantage.

translation.en: Maybe they're bad at their jobs.
You should have kept one alive to question.
translation.fr: Tu aurais dû en garder un en vie.

translation.en: You enjoy killing too much.
I'm sure Sleepy Chan sent them.
Probably payback for the dumbass Xing killed on the docks.
translation.fr: Pour venger l'idiot que Xing a tué sur les quais.

translation.en: Always consider the most complicated possibility,
translation.fr: Envisage toujours la possibilité la plus compliquée,

translation.en: then work your way back to the most obvious answer.
translation.fr: puis reviens à la réponse la plus évidente.

translation.en: Then you will never be surprised.
Yes.
What's wrong?
-Move! -Cover us!
-Cover us! -Go get the car!
[man, in Mandarin] Make the windows bulletproof and put a steel bomb-shield under the chassis.
translation.fr: Blindez les fenêtres et mettez un bouclier sous le châssis.

translation.en: Hurry!
Any word from the hospital?
[in English] We should switch to English.
We don't know who we can trust.
translation.fr: On ne sait pas à qui se fier.

translation.en: He's out of surgery. In a coma.
translation.fr: Il était au bloc. Il est dans le coma.

translation.en: There was a lack of blood flow to the brain,
so we don't know if he will wake up.
translation.fr: donc on ignore s'il se réveillera.

translation.en: I want Sleepy Chan, and his vain prick son Drowsy, alive.
translation.fr: Je veux Sleepy Chan et son connard de fils Drowsy, vivants.

translation.en: No one gets to kill them but me.
Okay, but--
They used me as bait to draw my father out of hiding.
translation.fr: Ils m'ont utilisé pour coincer mon père.

translation.en: Sleepy Chan is tired of being head of the second most powerful Triad family.
translation.fr: Sleepy Chan veut sa famille à la tête de la triade.

translation.en: He wants to take our place, maybe even declare himself Dragon Head.
translation.fr: Il veut notre place ou même se déclarer Tête de Dragon.

translation.en: But we don't know if Sleepy Chan is behind this.
translation.fr: On ignore si Sleepy Chan est derrière tout ça.

translation.en: No one could ID the attackers. These are fresh faces.
translation.fr: On n'a pas pu identifier les agresseurs. Ils sont nouveaux.

translation.en: Some new gang with the balls and brains to find me
translation.fr: Des nouveaux qui auraient le cran et l'intelligence

translation.en: and organize a sophisticated attack like that?
No way.
[man, in Mandarin] Charles.
[in English] Your father would tell you to be cautious.
translation.fr: Ton père te dirait d'être prudent.

translation.en: Not to jump to conclusions.
translation.fr: De ne tirer aucune conclusion hâtive.

translation.en: If this wasn't Sleepy Chan,
translation.fr: Si ce n'était pas Sleepy Chan,

translation.en: you could start a full-out war for no reason.
translation.fr: tu pourrais déclencher une guerre sans raison.

translation.en: Don't be headstrong, huh?
My father noticed something about the body before he was shot. Any idea what it was?
translation.fr: Mon père a vu quelque chose sur le corps. Tu sais ce que c'était ?

translation.en: No, but I did hear what he said to you after he was shot.
translation.fr: Non, mais j'ai entendu ce qu'il t'a dit après le coup de feu.

translation.en: Your mother's name.
[in Mandarin] Charles.
[in English] What has your father always taught you? Huh?
translation.fr: Que t'a toujours appris ton père ? Hein ?

translation.en: Protect the family.
If anything ever happened to him, to go look after my mother. No hesitation.
translation.fr: Que s'il lui arrivait malheur, je devrais veiller sur ma mère. Sans hésiter.

translation.en: Your mother must be protected at all costs.
translation.fr: Ta mère doit être protégée à tout prix.

translation.en: She is the key to our power.
translation.fr: Elle est la clé de notre pouvoir.

translation.en: Look, she left because it was her duty to go.
translation.fr: Écoute, elle est partie parce que c'était son devoir.

translation.en: -To-- -Protect the family.
I know.
Your mother and Bruce are alone out there.
translation.fr: Ta mère et Bruce sont seuls.

translation.en: -Do you want me to send someone with you? -No.
I don't wanna draw any attention.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas attirer l'attention.

translation.en: -And I'll have my brother. -I don't think he's gonna be much help.
translation.fr: - Et j'aurai mon frère. - Il ne serait pas d'une grande aide.

translation.en: He wasn't raised in this life.
translation.fr: Il ne connaît pas cette vie.

translation.en: He'll have to learn quickly, then.
He's a Sun.
♪ You know I'm comin' back If you move it like that ♪
-Two, I can make it all about you… ♪ -Damn.
♪ Four, yeah, I think I like that more ♪ ♪ Sheesh dressed real clean Like James Dean… ♪
-There. That's our Lyft. -♪ I can make you go mainstream ♪
-♪ Never come down… ♪ -Hello, ladies.
-Aah! How's it goin'? You guys have-- -[retching]
translation.fr: Comment ça va ? Vous passez une bonne…

translation.en: No, no, no! No! No, no, no!
-When did you have pizza? -♪ Gimme some, some of that ♪
translation.fr: Tu as mangé de la pizza ?

translation.en: ♪ Phone's been on blast like all day… ♪
[woman] Bruce! Wake up!
You're going to be late!
I'm coming.
-Were you out working late last night? -Yep.
translation.fr: - Tu as travaillé tard hier soir ? - Oui.

translation.en: Just working?
Yes, Mom. I stopped doing the other thing.
translation.fr: Oui, maman. J'ai arrêté l'autre truc.

translation.en: I swear.
Oh, chubby cheeks. I'm so proud of you.
translation.fr: Mon petit joufflu chéri. Je suis fière de toi.

translation.en: -Text me when you get to school. -Why?
translation.fr: - Préviens-moi quand tu seras en cours. - Pourquoi ?

translation.en: Because I just told you to.
translation.fr: Parce que je te le dis.

translation.en: Go get smart.
Okay.
-♪ Here I am dreaming again ♪ -♪ Dreaming ♪ -♪ Dreaming ♪ -♪ Dreaming ♪
-♪ It always makes me cry… ♪ -There's still 20 minutes left.
Oh, but I'm-- I'm finished.
You turned the last one in early, too, and it cost you points.
translation.fr: Tu as rendu le dernier en avance et ça t'a coûté des points.

translation.en: Bs still get degrees.
No.
I-- I just need a tiny extension to get the money together.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin d'un délai pour trouver l'argent.

translation.en: Bruce, the only extension I want from you
translation.fr: Bruce, tout ce que je veux,

translation.en: is you extending your hand to grab a pen and write me a tuition check.
translation.fr: c'est que tu attrapes un stylo et que tu me fasses un chèque.

translation.en: You have until tomorrow or we'll have no choice but to invalidate the semester.
translation.fr: Tu as jusqu'à demain, ou on annulera ton semestre.

translation.en: Okay.
Just…
How much education would this buy me?
There's $7 here.
And this bill smells like puke.
translation.fr: Et ce billet sent le vomi.

translation.en: It's a down payment.
You can't even buy a club sandwich in the cafeteria for $7.
translation.fr: On ne peut même pas acheter un sandwich à la cafétéria avec 7 $.

translation.en: Maybe that's the problem.
Maybe we-- we should all refuse to pay our tuition
translation.fr: Refusons tous de payer nos frais de scolarité

translation.en: until the school addresses the economic injustice of this institution!
translation.fr: tant que l'établissement ne résoudra pas l'injustice économique.

translation.en: Who's with me?
Get out of the way!
-You suck, dude. Move! -Next.
translation.fr: T'es nul, mec. Bouge ! Au suivant.

translation.en: -Hands up, bitch! -Fucking bitch!
Dude, I could have shot you.
You have a gun?
No, but if I did, I could have shot you.
translation.fr: Non. Mais si j'en avais une, je t'aurais buté.

translation.en: -What's up, baby? -What's up?
translation.fr: - Ça va, mon pote ? - Ça va ?

translation.en: Yo, you're just in time. I'm about to smoke me a little kush
translation.fr: Pile à l'heure. J'allais fumer un peu

translation.en: and hang out with my boy Keanu on Cyberpunk.
translation.fr: et traîner avec mon pote Keanu sur Cyberpunk.

translation.en: You, uh, gettin' high on your own supply?
translation.fr: Tu te défonces avec ta marchandise ?

translation.en: I sell molly and cocaine.
translation.fr: Je vends des taz et de la coke.

translation.en: Weed's legal.
Dude, I'm starting to think my thumbs are, like, freakishly fast.
translation.fr: Je commence à croire que mes pouces sont super rapides.

translation.en: Like Julio Jones fast, but just my thumbs.
translation.fr: Comme Julio Jones, mais juste mes pouces.

translation.en: Alexa, play my jams.
[Alexa] You got it.
Can I, um…
I need a favor.
Anything, bro.
I need to borrow some money.
How long have I known you? Since the fifth grade?
translation.fr: Depuis quand je te connais ? Le CM2 ?

translation.en: Hell, I practically taught your ass English.
translation.fr: Je t'ai presque appris à parler.

translation.en: Bro, friends like us? They don't borrow, man.
translation.fr: Des amis comme nous ? Ils n'empruntent pas.

translation.en: They give.
So, how much we talkin'?
-Dollars? -It's for school.
-I will pay you back. -Doesn't your mom pay for school?
translation.fr: - Je te rembourserai. - Ta mère ne paie pas ?

translation.en: Yes, but I kind of spent this semester's tuition money on something else.
translation.fr: Si, mais j'ai dépensé l'argent de ce semestre pour autre chose.

translation.en: I thought you stopped with that stuff. You promised your mom.
translation.fr: T'avais pas arrêté ? Tu as promis à ta mère.

translation.en: It's the best improv class in LA.
translation.fr: C'est le meilleur cours d'impro de Los Angeles.

translation.en: Will Ferrell and Rachel Dratch are alums!
translation.fr: Will Ferrell et Rachel Dratch sont des anciens élèves !

translation.en: You spent five grand learning how to play pretend.
translation.fr: T'as claqué cinq mille pour apprendre à faire semblant.

translation.en: -[laughing] -It's improv, okay?
It-- it's an art form.
[scoffs] Okay! If you're so proud of it, why not tell your mom you're doing it?
translation.fr: D'accord. Si tu en es si fier, pourquoi le cacher à ta mère ?

translation.en: 'Cause she thinks it's a waste of time, and Bruce Sun doesn't have the nuts to be his own man.
translation.fr: Elle pense que c'est une perte de temps et Bruce Sun est un petit lâche.

translation.en: Yo, you think John Cho hides what he does from his mom?
translation.fr: Tu crois que John Cho cache ce qu'il fait à sa mère ?

translation.en: Plus, my cash is more powder than liquid right now, so, uh…
translation.fr: Et j'ai plus de coke que d'argent, donc…

translation.en: [whispers] Shit.
Listen, I do have a way you can earn that money.
translation.fr: Écoute, j'ai un plan pour que tu gagnes du fric.

translation.en: -I'm not selling drugs, TK. -[gasps] That's not my plan.
translation.fr: Je vais pas dealer, TK. C'est pas mon plan.

translation.en: It's always your plan.
Okay, that's my plan.
It's my night to do handouts at the club, and I could use your help.
translation.fr: C'est ma soirée au club et tu pourrais m'aider.

translation.en: With the two of us, we would clear five G so easy.
translation.fr: À nous deux, on peut rafler cinq mille, facile.

translation.en: Dude, I am not a criminal!
translation.fr: Mec, je suis pas un criminel !

translation.en: Yeah, and neither am I.
I'm an employee at a company that sells a product. We have a hierarchy.
translation.fr: Je suis vendeur pour une entreprise. On a une hiérarchie

translation.en: We have quotas just like every pharmaceutical company out there!
translation.fr: et des quotas, comme toutes les sociétés pharmaceutiques.

translation.en: Well, except if I fuck up, they slit my throat, toss me in a sack in the Rio Hondo.
translation.fr: Sauf si je merde, ils me butent et me jettent dans le Rio Hondo.

translation.en: Yeah, you're not doing a good job selling this.
translation.fr: Tu me le vends pas hyper bien.

translation.en: How's this for a sell?
There's no way you're gonna earn five grand in a year, let alone one night.
translation.fr: Tu ne gagneras jamais 5 000 $ en un an, encore moins en une soirée.

translation.en: Aren't you studying to be a doctor?
Dude, all you're gonna do your whole life is sell drugs anyway.
translation.fr: Tu vas vendre de la drogue toute ta vie.

translation.en: I bet you can earn college credit if you work with me tonight.
translation.fr: Tu gagneras des points si tu bosses avec moi ce soir.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -If I'm just doing handoffs
translation.fr: Si je me contente de vendre

translation.en: and collecting money,
translation.fr: et que je ramasse de l'argent,

translation.en: it's not technically selling drugs.
translation.fr: je ne vends pas de la drogue.

translation.en: I mean, it totally is. It's, like, exactly selling them.
translation.fr: Ben si. C'est exactement ce que tu fais.

translation.en: But who cares?
How about this? Don't even sell the drugs.
translation.fr: Écoute. Ne vends pas la drogue.

translation.en: Just act like a dude who's selling the drugs.
translation.fr: Joue le rôle d'un mec qui vend de la drogue.

translation.en: I mean, ah, it-- it would be a good acting exercise.
translation.fr: J'avoue, ce serait un bon exercice d'impro.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Now we're talkin'.
[whispers] Okay. Okay.
-Yeah. -Mm-hmm?
-Let's do it. -That's my boy right there.
Choosin' life just like Wham!
translation.fr: Tu dis oui à la vie, comme Wham!

translation.en: [woman] Hello and welcome to Los Angeles.
translation.fr: Bonsoir et bienvenue à Los Angeles.

translation.en: The current temperature is 72 degrees Fahrenheit.
Please do not forget to check the seat-back pocket for smaller items.
translation.fr: N'oubliez rien dans la poche arrière de votre siège.

translation.en: Checked luggage can be found at carousel seven.
translation.fr: Vos bagages se situent au tapis numéro sept.

translation.en: Thank you for flying with us, and please enjoy your stay in sunny Los Angeles.
translation.fr: Merci et bon séjour sous le soleil de Los Angeles.

translation.en: Who sent you?
[in Mandarin] Sleepy Chan?
[in Mandarin] Riddance of evil… must be thorough.
-[dog barking] -Bruce.
Ma.
[in Mandarin] Charles?
Who's this?
I don't know.
I brought pastries.
Your beard looks terrible.
Look what you did to the house!
translation.fr: Regarde ce que tu as fait à la maison !

translation.en: He did most of this.
Did you even try to clean up?
Do you not clean up after yourself at home?
translation.fr: Tu ne nettoies pas chez toi ?

translation.en: I usually smoke and wait for people to come clean up.
translation.fr: Je fume et j'attends que les gens nettoient.

translation.en: There are no people here.
Just us.
Little Fatty.
My handsome little boy.
Have you eaten? Come on, I'll make you beef noodles.
translation.fr: Tu as faim ? Je te prépare des nouilles au bœuf.

translation.en: Fetch the good knife.
Have you gotten married yet?
They shot Dad.
He's in a coma.
Will he live?
They don't know.
He's strong.
A boy from the country doesn't get to where he got if he's not strong.
translation.fr: Un paysan ne réussit pas comme lui s'il n'est pas fort.

translation.en: I saw that in him before anyone else did.
translation.fr: J'ai vu sa force avant tout le monde.

translation.en: It was Sleepy Chan.
Those two have been fighting to be the big fish for 20 years.
translation.fr: Ces deux-là se disputent la première place depuis 20 ans.

translation.en: But we can't jump to conclusions.
translation.fr: Ne tirons pas de conclusions hâtives.

translation.en: There is always more than what first appears.
translation.fr: Il y a toujours plus qu'il n'y paraît.

translation.en: Maybe it's time we cash in the insurance policy.
translation.fr: On doit encaisser la police d'assurance.

translation.en: I decide when and if we do that.
translation.fr: Je décide quand et si on le fait.

translation.en: With all due respect,
you washed your hands in the golden bowl a long time ago.
translation.fr: mais tu as rendu ton tablier il y a longtemps.

translation.en: With Big Sun the way he is, anyway, I'm in charge.
translation.fr: On connaît Big Sun, et c'est moi qui commande.

translation.en: Who taught you to chop?
TV?
-[sighs] -[in English] Go start cleaning up.
Is this him?
He looks soft.
[chuckles] Not soft.
Sensitive.
Same thing.
He wanted to be an actor.
One of those who makes stuff up as he goes?
-Improv? -Yeah, I put a stop to that.
translation.fr: - De l'impro ? - Oui, j'y ai mis un terme.

translation.en: Does he know about me and Dad? About where he comes from?
translation.fr: Il est au courant pour papa et moi ? Ses origines ?

translation.en: He thinks his father is a gambler
translation.fr: Son père est accro aux jeux,

translation.en: and, uh, you are in Antarctica working with penguins.
translation.fr: et tu es en Antarctique avec des pingouins.

translation.en: [in Mandarin] Fuck.
[in English] Is he stupid?
Bruce and I kept hidden from the world by being boring.
translation.fr: Bruce et moi nous sommes cachés du monde en étant ennuyeux.

translation.en: I kept you hidden from him by being exciting.
translation.fr: Je t'ai tenu à l'écart en te rendant fascinant.

translation.en: Both work.
I need to find local muscle to help me look after you.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin d'hommes pour te protéger.

translation.en: Yuan told me about a club where I can find some guys.
translation.fr: Yuan m'a parlé d'un club où je peux recruter.

translation.en: I thought my brother would be able to have my back, but…
translation.fr: Je pensais que mon frère m'aiderait, mais il est irrécupérable, sauf si Sleepy aime les blagues.

translation.en: appears he's useless unless Sleepy wants to play charades.
translation.fr: mais il est irrécupérable, sauf si Sleepy aime les blagues.

translation.en: We have to stay hidden for as long as possible.
translation.fr: On doit rester cachés le plus longtemps possible.

translation.en: Whoever's behind this followed you here from Taipei,
translation.fr: Qui que ce soit, on t'a suivi depuis Taipei,

translation.en: but you were too arrogant to notice.
Your only responsibility right now is to protect me and Bruce.
translation.fr: Ta seule responsabilité est de nous protéger, Bruce et moi.

translation.en: Bruce is a grown man. He should be able to look after himself.
translation.fr: Bruce est un adulte. Il devrait pouvoir se débrouiller.

translation.en: In a few hours, they're gonna realize this one hadn't succeeded.
translation.fr: Dans quelques heures, ils réaliseront son absence.

translation.en: I'll be back before then.
I am not a kid anymore.
translation.fr: Je ne suis plus un enfant.

translation.en: I know what I'm doing.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que je fais.

translation.en: -[in Mandarin] You're not going to eat? -I'm not hungry.
translation.fr: - Tu ne manges pas ? - Je n'ai pas faim.

translation.en: Come on, the boss needs to make sure you're cool.
translation.fr: Le boss veut voir que tu es cool.

translation.en: But, uh, I'm not cool.
translation.fr: Mais je ne suis pas cool.

translation.en: Not that kind of cool.
Cool as in not a cop and won't totally fuck this up.
translation.fr: Cool, du genre, pas un flic qui va tout foirer.

translation.en: Wait, wait. I-- I don't think I can go through with this.
translation.fr: Attends, je ne suis pas sûr d'y arriver.

translation.en: It's not a big deal. Come on.
Yes, it is.
My mom is, like, super cheap,
so the Wi-Fi in our house is terrible,
translation.fr: le wifi chez nous est nul,

translation.en: but the guy next door has, like, mega 5G with boosters and everything.
translation.fr: mais le voisin a une 5G de ouf avec des amplificateurs et tout.

translation.en: Okay, so?
Two years ago, I figured out his password.
translation.fr: Il y a deux ans, j'ai trouvé son mot de passe.

translation.en: It was his home address.
But I never logged onto his network.
translation.fr: mais je ne me suis jamais connecté.

translation.en: Do you understand?
Yeah. You're an idiot.
No!
I-- I'm an honest person.
Okay? I don't steal or hurt people.
translation.fr: Je ne vole pas, et je ne blesse pas.

translation.en: Selling drugs isn't technically either.
translation.fr: Dealer, ce n'est ni l'un ni l'autre, mais c'est de la même famille.

translation.en: -But it feels like it's the same family. -Look, Bruce, I know you.
translation.fr: Dealer, ce n'est ni l'un ni l'autre, mais c'est de la même famille. Bruce, je te connais. Je sais ce que tu attends de la vie.

translation.en: I know what you want out of life.
translation.fr: Bruce, je te connais. Je sais ce que tu attends de la vie.

translation.en: You want that million-dollar car,
translation.fr: Tu veux une voiture de course,

translation.en: hot girls goin' wild,
translation.fr: des filles sexy à tes pieds,

translation.en: and the envy and adoration of every guy from here to Hong Kong.
translation.fr: l'envie et l'adoration de tous les mecs d'ici à Hong Kong.

translation.en: I guess. I mostly just don't wanna be the biggest loser in the room anymore.
translation.fr: Oui. Mais surtout, je ne veux plus être le plus gros loser.

translation.en: Exactly.
You want respect. You wanna be the man.
translation.fr: Tu veux du respect. Tu veux être le boss.

translation.en: Look at me. I'm basically a moron.
I know people, and I know how this world works.
translation.fr: Je sais comment ce monde fonctionne.

translation.en: If you wanna be a man and not a little boy,
translation.fr: Si tu veux être un homme et pas un garçon,

translation.en: you've gotta be willing to make bad choices now and then.
translation.fr: tu dois parfois enfreindre les règles.

translation.en: What do you say?
Uh, hello, sir. Nice to meet you. Uh, I'm Bruce.
translation.fr: Bonsoir, monsieur. Enchanté. Je suis Bruce.

translation.en: Hi!
It is so nice to meet you.
I'm May.
That's Monk. He's from Hong Kong.
translation.fr: Voilà Monk. Il vient d'Hong Kong.

translation.en: And Jimmy. He just had a baby.
translation.fr: Et Jimmy. Il vient d'avoir un bébé.

translation.en: And the guy who looks like an orange hipster is Bojing.
translation.fr: Et le hipster orange, c'est Bojing.

translation.en: Don't get him started on his fantasy football team.
translation.fr: Ne le lance pas sur son club de foot virtuel.

translation.en: And the guy with the scissors is Ernie. He's a wiz with Chinese paper cutting.
translation.fr: Et le type aux ciseaux, c'est Ernie. Un as du papier découpé chinois.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Cool.
TK didn't mention how handsome you are.
translation.fr: TK n'a pas dit que tu étais beau.

translation.en: Well, that'd be a… weird thing for TK to say. [laughs]
translation.fr: Ça serait bizarre si TK disait ça.

translation.en: Wouldn't it?
Oh! You're funny too!
Tell me about you, Bruce. What are your hobbies?
translation.fr: Dis-moi, Bruce. Quels sont tes passe-temps ?

translation.en: Oh, I don't know. Uh…
-Don't say improv. -I play some video games.
-Uh-huh. -Do some… improv.
[whispers] Oh fuck.
What about you?
-I have a loom in my house. -Like, for weaving?
translation.fr: - J'ai un métier à tisser. - Pour tisser !

translation.en: Exactly! Like, I make a little extra money selling stuff on Etsy.
translation.fr: Exactement ! Je vends des trucs sur Etsy.

translation.en: -[Bruce] Cool. -And I also like to do this.
translation.fr: Cool. Et j'aime aussi faire ça.

translation.en: -My real passion is selling drugs. -Hmm.
translation.fr: Ma vraie passion, c'est vendre de la drogue.

translation.en: Lots of them.
It's my baby.
Selling drugs is your baby?
Yes, Bruce.
And when I hire you to sell them for me, I'm handing you my baby.
translation.fr: Et en t'engageant, je te confie mon bébé.

translation.en: Do you understand how big a responsibility that is?
translation.fr: Tu comprends l'ampleur de cette responsabilité ?

translation.en: How upset I would be if you didn't care for my baby in the right way,
translation.fr: Et ma colère si tu ne prenais pas soin de mon bébé

translation.en: or, God forbid, hurt it?
translation.fr: ou si tu lui faisais du mal ?

translation.en: I think so.
Yes.
Definitely.
Hmm. You're a nice person.
-Thanks. -It wasn't meant as a compliment.
But I trust nice people.
They're honest, loyal,
translation.fr: Les bons gars sont honnêtes, loyaux,

translation.en: too scared to fuck me over.
translation.fr: et ils ont peur de m'arnaquer.

translation.en: Hooray!
I'm gonna go for a dance. Set him up.
And remember, have fun!
Bye.
See ya.
Cool jacket.
You did good.
Let's get to work.
-Hey! Here you are. -Oh, right, right. Uh…
translation.fr: - Hé ! Tu es là. - Ah oui.

translation.en: Would you like to buy some drugs?
translation.fr: Tu veux acheter de la drogue ?

translation.en: No, I'm not a cop. I-- I am not a cop!
translation.fr: Non, je ne suis pas flic.

translation.en: Yo, how's it going?
Like trying to sell ice cream on a cold day.
translation.fr: J'ai l'impression de vendre de la glace en hiver.

translation.en: Product's good. Demand is obviously high. You just gotta have the right attitude.
translation.fr: Le produit est bon. La demande est forte. Il faut avoir la bonne attitude.

translation.en: [Bruce] Like how?
Act more like a drug dealer and less like a fucking dork.
translation.fr: Agis comme un dealer et moins comme un bouffon.

translation.en: Improv!
Come on! Let's dance.
I don't have time for this.
Oh! Uh… you want some snow?
You know, some-- some pearl?
Nose candy?
Uh, how about a disco biscuit?
Whoa, hey! Okay, I'm with May! See? I've got the pin!
translation.fr: Hé ! Je suis avec May ! Tu vois ? J'ai l'épingle !

translation.en: Oh shit. Are-- are you a cop?
Oh God. Oh no, no, no.
Okay, okay. I-- I haven't sold anything.
I promise. Okay? I tried to, but I'm not any good at it.
translation.fr: Promis. J'ai essayé, mais je ne suis pas doué.

translation.en: -I-- I will testify against-- -Shut up!
What the hell are you doing here? Mom's gonna kill you.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu fous ici ? Maman va te tuer.

translation.en: Mom?
I'm your brother. Charles.
We're getting out of here now.
-Wait, what? -Is there a problem here?
translation.fr: Attends, quoi ? - Il y a un problème ? - Oui.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.fr: - Il y a un problème ? - Oui.

translation.en: You're standing in my way.
He's working.
He quits.
-[groans] -[gasps] Oh my God.
[Bruce] Oh my God!
A taser?
[groans] My grandmother carries one in her purse.
translation.fr: Ma grand-mère en a un dans son sac.

translation.en: Taser did just fine taking you out.
translation.fr: Le taser t'a mis à terre.

translation.en: Who are you?
I'm, uh, Bruce.
Stop with the bullshit.
You think you can infiltrate my crew?
-Who are you working for? -For you!
translation.fr: - Tu bosses pour qui ? - Pour toi !

translation.en: I do some driving for Lyft,
but we're considered independent contractors--
He doesn't know shit.
Oh, and how do you know that?
-Because he's my brother. -[Bruce] That's not true.
translation.fr: - Parce que c'est mon frère. - C'est faux.

translation.en: I've never met this guy before.
We haven't seen each other in a long time. Since he left Taiwan.
translation.fr: On ne s'est pas vus depuis qu'il a quitté Taïwan.

translation.en: We shared a bedroom when we were little with a red carpet and a fake dog.
translation.fr: On partageait une chambre avec un tapis rouge et un faux chien.

translation.en: Mom wouldn't let us have a real one.
translation.fr: Maman ne voulait pas d'un vrai.

translation.en: My name is Charles Sun.
[May] Bullshit. How do we know that's true?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui me dit que c'est vrai ?

translation.en: Well, I could prove it by killing all of you.
translation.fr: Je pourrais le prouver en vous tuant tous.

translation.en: Or you could just check my ID.
translation.fr: Ou tu peux vérifier mes papiers.

translation.en: Do you have any idea who this guy is?
Oh my God! He is a legend. They call him Chairleg Sun.
translation.fr: Oh, mon Dieu ! C'est une légende. Chairleg Sun.

translation.en: His dad is the Red Pole of the Jade Dragons,
translation.fr: Son père est le Bâton rouge des Dragons de jade,

translation.en: like, the biggest Triad in Taiwan.
translation.fr: la plus grande triade de Taïwan.

translation.en: Super brutal. Super ruthless.
He groomed his son to be his own personal assassin.
translation.fr: Il a formé son fils à devenir son assassin privé.

translation.en: Sometimes families are really fucked up.
translation.fr: Il y a des familles tordues.

translation.en: Is it true that you got your numbers
translation.fr: C'est vrai que tu as eu ton chiffre

translation.en: after beating ten assassins to death at Saturday morning dim sum
translation.fr: après avoir battu à mort dix assassins au restaurant

translation.en: with only a chair leg?
I killed three men with a rolling pin yesterday.
translation.fr: Trois avec un rouleau à pâtisserie hier.

translation.en: Like I said, a legend!
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Hold--
Dad's rich?
And I'm here driving a Lyft?
We were trying to keep you safe.
Yeah, nice fucking work!
[May] Why are you here?
Are you trying to make a move in LA?
translation.fr: Tu essaies de t'étendre à LA ?

translation.en: Because we're not interested in foreign interference.
translation.fr: Parce qu'on ne veut pas d'intrusion étrangère.

translation.en: I don't like working for someone else.
translation.fr: Je n'aime pas travailler pour quelqu'un d'autre.

translation.en: I just need a couple of guys to help me for a few days.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin d'hommes pour quelques jours.

translation.en: -Hmm. With what? -None of your business.
translation.fr: Pour quoi ? Ça ne te regarde pas.

translation.en: I pay well.
Maybe even enough to hire you.
Bitch, you definitely can't afford me.
translation.fr: Pétasse, je suis trop chère pour toi.

translation.en: Boys,
we're gonna soften up Chairleg a little.
If he fights back, shoot his brother in the balls.
translation.fr: S'il se défend, visez les couilles de son frère.

translation.en: What?
Oh! Oh shit! No!
Why are you stopping?
-I just gotta catch my breath. -We're in the middle of a beating.
translation.fr: - Je reprends mon souffle. - On est en pleine raclée.

translation.en: They don't usually go on this long.
translation.fr: Ça ne dure pas aussi longtemps.

translation.en: I'm good to take a break if you guys need one.
translation.fr: Faisons une pause si vous en avez besoin.

translation.en: Bruce, do me a favor.
Don't tell Mom.
What?
Any last words you wanna say to your brother?
translation.fr: Tu veux dire un dernier mot à ton frère ?

translation.en: [in Mandarin] Fuck!
The riddance of evil must be thorough.
-[man, in English] Where's Charles Sun? -[woman] Spread out! Find Charles Sun!
translation.fr: Où est Charles Sun ? Dispersez-vous ! Trouvez Charles Sun !

translation.en: [man] Where's Charles Sun?
Wake up.
We have to go. We have to go.
-[Charles groans] -[Bruce] Come on. Come on.
Let's go.
[grunts] Come on. Let's go.
-[tires squeal] -Bruce!
[Bruce] Oh shit!
-Who is that? -[door slams]
My brother.
-[Bruce] Wait! -[groans] We can't come in looking like this. Mom is going to freak!
translation.fr: Attends ! On ne peut pas entrer comme ça. Maman va flipper !

translation.en: I found Bruce! -He's safe. [groans] -What the hell?
translation.fr: J'ai retrouvé Bruce ! Il est en sécurité.

translation.en: Mom?
Charles, go get changed. We gotta get rid of the body.
translation.fr: Charles, va te changer. On va se débarrasser du corps.

translation.en: Bruce, go to bed. You got a test tomorrow.
translation.fr: Bruce, va te coucher. Tu as un exam demain.
